mean_cn: n. 遗迹，（生）退化的器官，残余，微量（一般用于否定句）
mean_en: a small part of something that still exists after the rest of it has stopped existing; usually used in negative sentences, to say that not even a small amount of something exists
sentence: The frescos on the wall are a last vestige of an ancient culture.
sentence_trans: 这幅壁画是古老文化的最后遗迹。
word_etyma: vestig脚印，踪迹 + e → 痕迹；残余
